content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel insecure about my life. Everyone is an enemy to me.
There has been a lot of conflict lately because of the pandemic. What seems to be causing the most of these issues is the constant feeling of insecurity. That is totally understandable.
Have you ever caught by the constant insecurity?
I have noticed that when I have a lot of stress, it makes me feel like I want to be alone or something. It can really help to make other people feel less guilty about the things they are doing.
